column9: he was a son of the late isidoro and filomena (del. bonis) lepizzera. mr. lepizzera was a social worker for the state of ri for many years. anthony is survived by his brother michael lepizzera of cranston
column10: the late marie santa maria and raymond lepizzera. his funeral will be held on monday
column11: at 10:00 a. m. from the nardolillo funeral home & crematory
column14: followed by a mass of christian burial at 11:00 a. m. in st. marys church
column15: cranston. burial will take place in st. ann cemetery
column16: cranston. visiting hours: monday morning from 9:00-10:00 a. m. condolences. click here to send a condolence richad cappalli. sorrento
column21: and ray: i was shocked and saddened to learn of tony's passing. he was one of my dearest friends most especially while we were growing up together from our vervena st. days through high school and beyond. i am so sorry for your loss. please accept my heartfelt condolences. sincerely
